Token.Abstract: TDSBMPlayerPlayerDelegate defines methods you can implement to handle connection notifications and to receive cue point events from the TDSBMPlayer.

Called when there's a Cue Point available to be processed. A NSDictionary is passed containing the Cue Point metadata. All the available keys are defined in CuePointEvent.h. See STWCueMetadataDictionary.pdf for more details on the available cue point information.

Parameter.Name: player
Parameter.Abstract: The SBM player which is receiving cue point events

Parameter.Name: cuePointEvent
Parameter.Abstract: A CuePointEvent object containing all cue point information.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the SBM player was unable to connect to the server.
Called when the SBM player established a connection with the server and is ready to receive cue points.

Parameter.Name: player
Parameter.Abstract: The SBM player whose connection was opened.
